about_the_game:
What Is Included

The demo provides a glimpse of the story of the Earth's center of Gravity. There are at least 5 endings in this demo from the main game's 17 endings. 

Gameplay

Gameplay is the same as the main game. You will play as Mirel, who happens to be a reporter. You will be armed with questions, answers and the choices you make. You will progress by making chooices to reach endings. An indicator will show you which one you have reached. You can buy the main game when you finished all endings in this demo.

About Main Game

Earth's Center of Gravity is an interactive visual novel with multiple endings. Game story is about the fate and revolves around an antique shop called the "Tower Antiques".

While you explore different possibilities, fate of self, fate of others, fate of earth, fate of universe will be revealed upon your choices and you will have to find your integrity in this mystic horror visual novel.

Tower Antiques will be the center of odd and dreadful events which will unfold during your journey through out it's ever expanding world. You will try to save yourself from oblivion, madness, despair, imprisonment, death or worse by examining the items inside Tower Antiques and observe it's previous visitors.

You will decide whether it's worth to learn the truth, see the next room, read that next book or ask the next question.

What will you choose to do, when your logic begins to fail you?

short_description: Earth's Center of Gravity is a mystic horror visual novel with multiple endings. The story revolves around Tower Antiques. "No one remembers how long Tower Antiques was there. But it remembers everyone. Even the ones who did not visit it yet." Tower Antiques is waiting for you to write your story.
